nodes.text: Jiruusi fruit was a type of fruit that shared its name with the world Jiruusi. After their EF76 Nebulon-B escort frigate Hellion's Dare came under attack above Jiruusi and fled into the Oridol Cluster, the Theelin Chass na Chadic, the Ishi Tib Sata Neek and the human Wyl Lark sat in the frigate's recreation room and sliced Jiruusi fruit to eat and throw at each other. Neek was able to catch the fruit in his beak, causing Chadic to laugh as juice dribble down her chin.
Jiruusi fruit was first mentioned in the 2019 novel Alphabet Squadron, which was written by Alexander Freed.
